86491.「何度も往復させて すまんな <pc>。\n ふたりが 破邪の秘技の試練に向かう:
Sorry for all the back and forth,
<pc>. There's something I must tell
you both before undergoing the trials.

86492.「レビュール街道北の 王家の墓の下に\n 人知れず広がる 迷宮についての話だ。:
I'm talking about the maze that lies
hidden beneath the Royal Tomb on the north
Reviewle Highway.

86493.「その名を…… 王家の迷宮と言う。: It is called... the Royal Maze.

86494.「王家の迷宮……。\n 聞いたことがありませんが それは？:
The Royal Maze...? I've never heard of it
before. What is it?

86495.「王家の者でも 知る者は限られている。\n 勇者とその盟友がそろった 今だからこ:
Only few among the royal family know what it
is. Now that the Hero and ally are together,
I decided to reveal its existence.

86496.「今の ふたりの修行の場として\n 最も適切であると 判断したからだ。:
I've also decided that it's the most
appropriate place for you two to train
together.

86497.「ふたりの修行の場……。: A place for us to train together...

86498.「アンルシアが 破邪の秘技を会得したとて\n そなたたち自身が 強くならなければ:
Even if Anlucia masters the Sacred Skills...
It still won't be easy going up against the
demons. You must become stronger.

86499.「だが 王家の迷宮に 挑むことで\n 勇者と盟友は さらなる成長を 望めるだろう:
By braving the Royal Maze, you both will be
able to grow stronger. Therefore, I will open
its doors.

86500.「現世と霊界の狭間にある 王家の迷宮に挑むには\n 肉体という衣を脱ぎ 精神体と:
The maze lies between our world and the world
of spirits. You must leave your physical body
behind. Think of this as a doorway for that.

86501.「扉の向こうは 王家の墓へと つながっている。\n 中に入ったら 奥にある大扉を:
This door will lead to the Royal Maze. Once
there, the giant door you see will lead you
further into the maze's depths.

86502.「……さて。実際に 行く前に\n いくつか 王家の迷宮について\n 聞いておいて:
But before you go, there are a few things you
should keep in mind.

86503.「この迷宮に入れるのは 勇者と盟友\n そして 盟友の従える魔物のみだ。\n 旅:
Only the Hero, their ally, and the ally's
monster companions may enter. Support
companions are not permitted to enter.

86504.「それと 探索の途中で 迷宮の外に出る時は\n この うつしよのカギが必要になる:
Also, when you finish exploring the maze,
you will need this World Key. I will leave
it in your care.

86508.<color_yellow>迷宮に入るには 勇気の輝石が必要です。\n勇気の輝石:
<color_yellow>Entering the maze will require Courage Augite.
You can get 15 of them per week, and you can
check how many you have at this door.

86509.「ありがとうございます ルシェンダさま。\n 私と <pc>のふたりは\n 王家:
Thank you, Lushenda. <pc> and
I will definitely use the Royal Maze to train
ourselves.

86510.「王家の迷宮は 未知なる領域だ。\n 少しずつ チカラをつけながら\n 徐々に進:
What lies in the maze is not well known. It's
best to progress gradually as you continue
to gain more strength.

86511.「……その果てに 何が待つのかは\n まだ 誰にも わからない。\n 決して 無:
No one knows for sure what lies at the end
of it... don't push yourselves too hard.

98830.<color_yellow>光の扉からは アンルシアの\n装備変更や スキル振り:
<color_yellow>From this door you may also change Anlucia's
equipment as well as allocate her skill
points.
